1.name: Default
1.description: Cleveland-class light cruiser Columbia, designation CL-56.

limitBreak.tier1: Gains Full Barrage I / Main Gun Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier2: Main Gun Mount +1 / Main Gun Efficiency +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Upgrades Full Barrage I→II / Main Gun Efficiency +15%

1.name: Flagship Protection
1.description: Reduces the damage taken by the Flagship by 15% (25%).

2.name: Anti-Air Mode
2.description: 25% activation when attacking with Anti-Air Guns: For 3 seconds, increase own Anti-Air by 20% (40%) but decrease Firepower by 40% (20%).

3.name: Full Barrage
3.description: Every 15 (10) times the main gun is fired, trigger Full Barrage - Cleveland Class I (II).

1.chinese: 克利夫兰级轻巡洋舰—哥伦比亚，舷号CL-56
1.chineseTL: Cleveland-class light cruiser, Columbia. Hull number CL-56.
1.japanese: クリーブランド級軽巡洋艦・コロンビア（CL-56)

2.chinese: 嗨，我是跑遍了大半个太平洋，获得10颗战役之星的哥伦比亚。我知道自己很厉害啦，要夸就多夸夸我姐姐克利夫兰吧。没事的话，我继续去巡航了？
2.chineseTL: Hi, I am the Columbia that sailed around half of the Pacific and earned 10 battle stars. I know how strong I am, so if you want to compliment someone, go compliment Cleveland. If there is nothing else, I am going to continue my patrol, okay?
2.japanese: ハーイ！私こそがかつて太平洋を駆け巡って、バトルスターを10個手に入れたコロンビアだ！まあまあそう褒めてくれなくていいの、褒めるなら姉のクリーブランドを褒めてね☆もう用はない？じゃあ巡回に戻るわよー
2.japaneseTL: Hi! I'm, Columbia, I sped about the Pacific and earned ten battle stars!Now, now, there's no need to heap praises on me. If you'd like to compliment someone, compliment my big sis, Cleveland☆ Is that all? I'll get back to my patrol then.

3.chinese: 指挥官好，克利夫兰级轻巡二号舰哥伦比亚就是我~是南卡罗莱纳的哥伦比亚不是首都那个哦~什么，南美洲的？你是故意装傻吧？
3.chineseTL: Hello Commander. I am the second ship of the Cleveland-class light cruisers, Columbia. It's the Columbia in South Carolina, not the one in the capital, okay? What, the one in South America? Are you acting dense on purpose?
3.japanese: クリーブランド級軽巡、二番艦のコロンビアとはこの私のことよ～首都のじゃなくて、あのサウスカロライナのコロンビアよ！もう~だからボゴタのコロンビアじゃないって！
3.japaneseTL: I'm the Cleveland-class light cruiser, 2nd ship, Columbia~ Not the capital city, the Columbia in South Carolina! Jeez~ Like I said, it's not the Columbia with Bogotá!

4.chinese: 今天也是风平浪静的好天气，很好很好~
4.chineseTL: Today's weather is pretty nice and calm. Good, good~
4.japanese: 今日も天気が穏やか！よしよし！
4.japaneseTL: The weather is calm today as well! Good, good!

5.chinese: 想了解我？那就让你看个够吧
5.chineseTL: You want to know more about me? Then I'll let you examine me until you have had enough.
5.japanese: 私のことを知りたい？どーぞー心ゆくまでご覧あれー
5.japaneseTL: Wanna know me better? You're welcome to look as much as you pleaseー

6.chinese: 指挥官问我在听什么？你猜？摇滚？错啦~
6.chineseTL: What I am listening to? Guess... Rock? Wrong!
6.japanese: なにを聞いてるのかって？さあ？当ててみてよー…ロックンロール？ブッブー！
6.japaneseTL: What I'm listening to? Who knows? Take a guess… Rock and roll? Bzzt, wrong!

7.chinese: 切，墨镜又被姐姐抢走了……
7.chineseTL: Tsk, sis took my shades again...
7.japanese: げぇ、サングラスまた姉貴に持っていかれちゃった……
7.japaneseTL: Guh, my sunglasses were taken by big sis again…

8.chinese: 战争结束后，去玩橄榄球也不错……
8.chineseTL: It would be pretty nice to play some football once the war is over...
8.japanese: 戦争が終わったら、ユニオンフットボールでもやってみよっかな……
8.japaneseTL: When the war is over, perhaps I should try Union football…

9.chinese: 干嘛啦！害我泡泡都吹破了~
9.chineseTL: What are you doing! It's your fault that the bubble burst!
9.japanese: もう！風船はじけちゃったじゃない！
9.japaneseTL: Jeez! My bubble popped because of you!

10.chinese: 指挥官喜欢的是星星，还是别的什么~？
10.chineseTL: Is it the stars that the Commander likes, or is it something else~?
10.japanese: 指揮官、このスターが好きなのかなー？そ～れ～と～も～？
10.japaneseTL: Commander, is it my star that you likeー? Or~some~thing~else~?

11.chinese: 刚把口香糖放进嘴里，又有新的任务下达了……
11.chineseTL: A new mission has been assigned, and just as I started chewing a new gum too...
11.japanese: 新しいガム噛んだばかりなのにもう新しい任務なの……？
11.japaneseTL: I've only just started chewing on a new stick of gum, and we've already gotten a new mission…?

12.chinese: 今天的任务也是小菜一碟，轻松轻松~
12.chineseTL: Once again, today's mission was a piece of cake!
12.japanese: 今日の任務もお茶の子さいさーい、ちょろいちょろい！
12.japaneseTL: Today's mission was easy peasy lemon squeezy!

13.chinese: 快去翻翻信箱吧，说不定有好东西呢
13.chineseTL: Let's go through the mailbox, maybe there is something good inside.
13.japanese: メールボックス確認してみない？いいものがあるかもよ？
13.japaneseTL: Aren't you checking the mailbox? There might be something good in there.

14.chinese: 回去喽，口香糖都嚼得没味道啦~
14.chineseTL: Let's head back, we been here for so long that even this gum has lost its flavor...
14.japanese: 帰ったね～、もーガム噛みすぎて味もなくなったよー
14.japaneseTL: You're back~, I've been chewing on this gum so long it's lost its tasteー

15.chinese: 姐妹们下班回家了，不去慰劳一下么？
15.chineseTL: They are returning home from work, shouldn't you go show them some appreciation?
15.japanese: みんな委託から上がったよー労いに行かないの？
15.japaneseTL: Everyone's back from the commission. Aren't you going to thank them?

16.japanese: えっへん、いい感じじゃない？

17.chinese: 切~没办法，就让你们见识下南方人的厉害吧
17.chineseTL: Tsk...I guess there's no other way, let me show you the prowess of a southerner.
17.japanese: ちっ、しょうがない！我々南部人の力を見せてやる！
17.japaneseTL: I-it can't be helped! I'll show you the strength of us southerners!

18.chinese: 没什么没什么，只是日常操作而已啦~
18.chineseTL: Nothing special, this is just daily routine for me...
18.japanese: 大したことないよ～普通、普通さ～
18.japaneseTL: It was nothing special~ Just another day~

20.chineseTL: Guns are merciless, good luck out there~
20.japanese: あたっても知らないぞー
20.japaneseTL: I'm not responsible if you get hit.

21.chineseTL: Don't think that I'm done just like this...
21.japanese: このままでは終わらないわよ！
21.japaneseTL: At this rate, it won't end!

22.chinese: 哈啊……看来你也不过如此，有所期待是我的错
22.chineseTL: Sigh...seems like you only amount to this much, it's my fault to set my expectations so high.
22.japanese: はぁ……この程度ね。期待した私が間違ってた
22.japaneseTL: Sigh… so that's all you've got. I was wrong to have expected anything.

23.chinese: 指挥官，天气不错，不出门透透风么？老呆在家里小心发霉哦~
23.chineseTL: Good day today, Commander, not going to get some fresh air? You will grow mold if you always stay indoors.
23.japanese: 指揮官、天気いいよ、でかけないの？お家に引きこもってばかりじゃくさっちゃうぞー
23.japaneseTL: Commander, the weather's great, so why not head out? You'll rot if you stay indoors all the time.

24.chinese: 什么？没想到我居然会喜欢芭蕾舞？你什么意思？再笑我可锤你了哦？
24.chineseTL: What? Didn't think that I would like ballet? What do you mean? Stop laughing, or I will whack you!
24.japanese: うん？私の趣味がバレエって思いもよらなかったって？…どういう意味よ！もうこれ以上笑ったら叩くわよ！
24.japaneseTL: Hmm? You never imagined that I'd be interested in ballet? Whaddya you mean by that! If you won't stop laughing I'll hit you!

25.chinese: 为什么只有左脚穿了袜子？这可是秘密，有本事就来脱掉试试呀，嘻嘻
25.chineseTL: Why am I only wearing socks on my left feet? That's classified information. Try taking it off if you can, hehe.
25.japanese: なぜ靴下が片足だけかって？ヒミツ！気になるなら脱がしてみてよ、えへへ♪
25.japaneseTL: Why do I wear socks only on one leg? It's a secret! If you're that curious, why don't you try taking it off, ehehe♪

26.chinese: 休假的时候见不到你，总觉得心里空落落的……让女孩子主动说这种话，你好意思吗，笨蛋！
26.chineseTL: During the vacations where I can't see you, I will always feel a little empty inside...Shouldn't you be ashamed, Making a girl say that by herself, idiot!
26.japanese: 休暇中あなたに会えなくて、心のどこかが寂しかったの……って女のコにこういうことを言わせるなんて、は、恥ずかしいじゃない！ばかぁ！
26.japaneseTL: During breaks, when I can't see you, I feel somewhat lonely… Hey, look at what you just made a girl say, i-it's embarrassing! Dummy!

27.chinese: 嗯……谢谢。希望今后就算远离了战场，我也能一直和指挥官在一起……哎呀，这样的台词真是不适合我，总之，我真的很高兴！
27.chineseTL: Emm...thanks. Hopefully from now on, even when we are not in the battlefield, I can still be together with Commander... Ah, lines like this really don't suit me! Anyways, I am really happy!
27.japanese: うん……ありがと。戦場から離れても、指揮官とずっと一緒に……ってこのセリフ、私に全然似合ってなーい！とにかく、今はすっごく嬉しいよ！
27.japaneseTL: Umm… thank you. I'll be with you, always, even when away from the battlefield… Wait, words like these don't suit me at all! Anyway, I'm really happy right now!

28.chinese: (克利夫兰)老姐，没我支援还是不行吧？
28.chineseTL: (Cleveland) Sis, you can't do it without my support, right?
28.japanese: （クリーブランドと出撃）姉貴～やっぱり私の支援がないとダメっしょ？
28.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Cleveland) Big sis~ As I thought, don't you need my support?

29.chinese: 想说难得的节日，姑且也准备了一份巧克力…不过，姐姐就不用说了，我们克利夫兰级多少对这方面都不太擅长呢…味道什么的，就请多多通融啦～
29.japanese: せっかくのバレンタインだし、チョコを作ってみたよ！…まあ姉貴もそうだけど、うちの海上騎士団ってこういうのにちょっと疎いとこもあるから、そこはお手柔らかにね！
